title: The Good, The Bad, and the League: 4/18 - 4/24
body:
_Your weekly dose of server problem-os, NA League news, and other!_

The League Client is (still) moving to a new storage design (making your local install better), the first Season split ended, MSI starts in a week, and[ Lux has a brand new comic](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PriHXLTfX5A&feature=youtu.be) on the way!

**Follow-Ups:**

* **Mac voice still not working properly** Reached out to Apple for assistance. 

**Server Stuff: **

* **API calls cause Payment issues (4/20, ~2 days)** Automated alerting notifies the NOC that errors with payments are above normal levels. Investigation leads to a 3rd party vendor having issues with API keys, leading to the increased failure rate. Worked with 3rd party vendor to fix API issue appropriately. 

* **Missions unavailable (4/23, ~3 hours)** A hardware update at a data center replaced various pieces of hardware. After the update, NOC noticed increased failure rates related to Missions and mission completion. Investigation led to an incorrect routing table on one of the new pieces of hardware installed. Updating the routing table fixed the issue, and errors returned to normal values.

**Game Stuff: **

* **Nope.jpg** 

**Player Support Issues:**

There’s a pretty stable amount of similar problems across the board in Player Support. We are also launching the new League Patcher, which should improve a bunch of things, as well as prevent you from needing to allow League through your firewall with each patch! Read about it [here ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/360015621174-New-League-patcher)and if you want to adjust your firewall one or two final times for the client, look [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3).

_Morgageddon & Couch Commando_

It is always nice to know these things, as a mod for this board here it will probably help me explain to people what might have happened if I see someone talking about an issue that is similar to issues that have been posted on "The Good, The Bad, and the League".

I have a suggestion for gameplay, not really a big per se, but just something that is annoying. {{champion:412}}  can't walk through his lantern. It can restrict his {{summoner:4}} , if he puts it down up against a wall, and make the player fail to {{summoner:4}} over a wall. It can also prevent {{champion:412}} from taking an optimal path to land a hook in a fight or skirmish. Just a quality of life thing, though it is still useful that enemies can't walk through the lantern so that you can block their path when they are up against a wall etc. Don't know if this is the right thread to put in, but just wanted to share my opinion

I have found a bug with {{champion:22}} E. The "seen" icon will not disappear if while seen by {{champion:22}} E and seen by a Scryer's bloom. Keep in mind that you have to be hit by {{champion:22}}  E first, and then a Scryers bloom
It's great. I love seeing this kind of open-ness and communication. Knowing what's going on and that it's being fixed is great. :3

I really love getting a peek at the behind the scenes at Riot! I may be a tad biased because I'm a massive nerd in this area, but still. :3

I really appreciate the work you do, and being extra informed about what all you do helps me appreciate it even more.
the constant updates help keep a nice connection between Riot and the players. It allows us to feel more interconnected in the process. Keep it up because why not.
